resources:
QuizApp
What is the term used for describing the judgmental or commonsense part of problem solving? Heuristic Critical Value based Analytical
What was originally called the "imitation game" by its creator? The Turing Tests LISP The Logic Theorist Cybernetics
Decision support programs are designed to help managers make: Budget projections Visual presentations Business decisions Vacation schedules
To invoke the LISP system, you must enter AI LISP Common LISP ADA
Seymour Papert of the MIT AI lab created a programming environment for children called: BASIC LOGO MYCIN FORTRAN
In LISP, the addition 3 + 2 is entered as 3 + 2 3 add 2 3 + 2 = (+ 3 2)
In LISP, the function assigns the symbol x to y is (setq y x) (set y = \'x') (setq y = \'x') (setq y \'x')
One of the leading American robotics centers is the Robotics Institute located at: CMU MIT RAND SRI
In a rule-based system, procedural domain knowledge is in the form of: Production rules Rule interpreters Meta-rules Control rules
